description:
Hina is the titular heroine who has superhuman abilities, which include telekinesis and explosion. She may be from another world or timeline, and it is implied she was the subject of experiments or used as a weapon. She usually lazes around at http://anidb.net/ch93277 [Nitta]`s apartment and sleeps in school. She is very particular about food despite demonstrably lacking a refined palate, and her favorite food is salmon roe.
Source: Wikipedia
name: Hina
